title: Quiet Views
text: A very short walk from Dongdaemun Station Exit 1, Seonggwak Park offers a lovely view of Heunginjimun Gate and Dongdaemun Design Plaza.  A short walk along the wall brings you to the Seoul City Wall museum (open Tues - Sat 0900-1900).  View at night was wonderful and only a

title: Small park near Heunginjimun Gate
text: When I came to Dongdaemun to view the Heunginjimun Gate, I noticed there is an uphill path just across the road, alongside the old Seoul City Wall. I decided to climb up for a better view of the surrounding area. There is this small park along the hillside. It was quiet, with only a few locals there. A good place to relax and enjoy the view.

title: City park next to the Seoul City Wall Museum
text: Just beyond Heunginjimun Gate on our way to visit the free Seoul City Wall Museum is Dongdaemun Seonggwak Park, it is small and hilly but the further you climb up the path next to the wall there are views of the city.  Just passed the museum in the park we observed a shady children's playground with a few pieces of outdoor equipment.  Continuing up the hill is Naksan Park.

title: A tranquil spot with great views
text: Bring your coffee with you and relax in the pagoda then when you're done climb along the wall to the museum and on your way enjoy the beautiful views of the city and mountains.I really loved the park and highly recommend visiting.

title: It is in Dongdaemun
text: I was staying in Dongdaemun and saw the old brick walls and they were at the Dongdaemun Gate. Worth the visit if you are around.

title: The park of a great view still unknown to many
text: This is the park locating on a hillside with the old Seoul City Walls. It has a great view of the old city walls behind and Dongdaemun Gate downward. This is also the entrance to Naksan Park and Ihwa Mural Village.Location:Close from metro 'Dongdaemun' exit #1 or #9. Locating across from Dongdaemun Gate. Walkable distance from DDP(Dongdaemun Design Plaza) as well.- Seonggwak in Korean means a fortress.- This amazing park is still yet to be famous and this is a good place to chill.- For seniors who have trouble to climb up the hill, there's an elevator in Seoul Design Center locating in the park. And the rear exit of this building is connected to the middle of the hill.
